name: tm66
effect: Teaches Payback to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Payback to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black_white: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user can use this attack after the target, its power is doubled.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user can use this attack after the target, its power is doubled.
